description: This database brings together existing information on erosion and relevant coastal characteristics in a GIS environment, facilitating broad-scale analysis.

data.title: CET
data.description: Parquet dataset with coastal erosion data for this region.

table:columns.name: source
table:columns.description: Source of coastline data used in analysis.

table:columns.name: country
table:columns.description: ISO 2-letter country code where the segment is located.

table:columns.name: covered
table:columns.description: Indicates if the coastal classification has been applied: 'Y' (Yes), 'N' (No), 'N/A' (Not included).

table:columns.name: seg_id
table:columns.description: Unique segment ID assigned within each country.

table:columns.name: seg_length
table:columns.description: Length of the coastal segment in meters.

table:columns.name: associated_floodplain
table:columns.description: Indicates if the segment is associated with a floodplain ('Y' for Yes, 'N' for No).

table:columns.name: local_floodplain
table:columns.description: ID of the local floodplain adjacent to the coastline segment.

table:columns.name: remote_floodplain_1
table:columns.description: ID of the first remote floodplain associated with the coastline segment.

table:columns.name: remote_floodplain_2
table:columns.description: ID of the second remote floodplain associated with the coastline segment.

table:columns.name: onshore_structure
table:columns.description: Indicates presence of onshore engineered structures affecting coastal evolution ('Y' for Yes, 'N' for No).

table:columns.name: offshore_structure
table:columns.description: Indicates presence of offshore structures like breakwaters affecting coastal evolution ('Y' for Yes, 'N' for No).

table:columns.name: harbour
table:columns.description: Indicates presence of a permanent port or harbour structure ('Y' for Yes, 'N' for No).

table:columns.name: geomorphological_class
table:columns.description: Classification of the coastal geomorphology (e.g., Beach, Erodible cliffs, Dune system, Wetlands).

table:columns.name: barrier
table:columns.description: Description of the broad-scale coastal barrier feature, if present (e.g., Spit, Barrier Island, Tombolo).

table:columns.name: primary_sediment_type
table:columns.description: Primary sediment type of the coastal segment (e.g., Sand, Mud, Rock, Sand/Gravel).

table:columns.name: secondary_sediment_type
table:columns.description: Secondary sediment type, if applicable (e.g., rock platforms in a sandy beach).

table:columns.name: historical_shoreline_change_regime
table:columns.description: Historical trend of shoreline movement from 1984 to 2021: 'Ero' (Erosion), 'Acc' (Accretion), 'Sta' (Stable).

table:columns.name: corine_code_18
table:columns.description: Corine 2018 land cover classification code for the segment.

table:columns.name: corine_code_simplified
table:columns.description: Simplified reclassification of Corine 2018 land cover codes.

table:columns.name: Future_erosion
table:columns.description: Probability of future erosion occurring at the segment location.

table:columns.name: Future_accretion
table:columns.description: Probability of future accretion occurring at the segment location.

table:columns.name: Future_stable
table:columns.description: Probability of future stability at the segment location.

table:columns.name: Notes
table:columns.description: Additional notes or comments on the segment.

table:columns.name: Local_floodplain_area_km2
table:columns.description: Total area (kmÂ²) of the associated local floodplain.

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Geospatial representation of the coastal segment in a MULTILINESTRING format.

title: The CoCliCo coastal characteristics database to support erosion analysis

geoparquet-stac-items.title: GeoParquet STAC items
geoparquet-stac-items.description: Snapshot of the collection's STAC items exported to GeoParquet format.
